attributes.action: introduce more  protection for those suffering from mental health problems and dementia against postal scams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: thousands of elderly and vunerable people in the U.K are being targeted by scam mail criminals from all over the world. we would like the prime minister to offer greater protection for those who become cronic scam mail victims and loose thousands of pounds due to mental health illness.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "introduce more protection for those suffering from mental health problems and dementia against postal scams."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21300


Prime Minister's Office
